import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-album-photos', templateUrl: './user-album-photos.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class UserAlbumPhotosComponent implements OnInit { ngOnInit(): void { } }
